WorkItem.ClosedComment: We don't actively support Win2k, only XP and up.
WorkItem.Description:
Rawr 4.0.x (latest), Silverlight 4, Win2000, AMD Phenom 8750 3-core
I am able to start and import my character correctly (although very slow), but doing anything further is not possible, as just i.e. hovering over 1 item or trying to use the sidebar will take ages (1 minute+) to perform.
CPU-usage is almost always at 100%
I tried to use the "offline" feature, yet NetFX_4.0 does not work with Win2000 at all.
Â 
I am aware that this is a quite old OS, yet I have always been able to use Rawr with it (and would like to continue doing so).

Comments.Message:
Win 2k doesn't even support more than 2 cores/processors for the Workstation version.  You're really ham-stringing yourself for most modern applications. 
How much ram do you have?  I'll try loading up one of my 2k VMs and see what I can see.
4GB (yes I know - Win2k cant make full use of it)
